definition: a quantity sufficient to satisfy, plug with a substance
details:
noun
- a quantity sufficient to satisfy
= example: a quantity sufficient to satisfy
- any material that fills a space or container
= example: any material that fills a space or container
= synonyms: filling
verb
- plug with a substance
= example: plug with a substance
- become full
= example: become full
= synonyms: fill up
- make full, also in a metaphorical sense
= example: make full, also in a metaphorical sense
= synonyms: fill up, make full
- fill or meet a want or need
= synonyms: meet
- fill to satisfaction
= synonyms: satiate
- eat until one is sated
= example: eat until one is sated
= synonyms: fill up
- appoint someone to (a position or a job)
- assume, as of positions or roles
= synonyms: take
- occupy the whole of
= example: occupy the whole of
= synonyms: occupy
